author: Jeffery Martin
title: Michigan Governor Wants to Extend Stay-at-Home Order, Setting Up Another Confrontation With Opponents
description: "We will likely need another short-term extension of the Stay Home, Stay Safe order," Whitmer said at a Wednesday news briefing.
content:
Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer said Wednesday another extension of the state's stay-at-home order could be needed in order to further mitigate the community spread of coronavirus.
"I want to be clear," Whitmer said during a Wednesday news briefing. "we w… [+1315 chars]
